rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: Check for global send email setting

value.stringValue: AND( ISPICKVAL([Notification__c].Initial_Email_Send_Status__c, "Pending"), OR( ISBLANK( [Notification__c].Appointment_Date__c ), ISBLANK( [Notification__c].Appointment_Day_of_Week__c), ISBLANK( [Notification__c].Appointment_Time__c ), ISBLANK( [Notification__c].Appointment_Year__c ), ISBLANK( TRIM( [Notification__c].Customer_Email__c ) ), ISBLANK( [Notification__c].Email_Template_Date_Label__c ), ISBLANK( [Notification__c].Email_Template_Number_Label__c ), ISBLANK( [Notification__c].Store_City__c ), ISBLANK( [Notification__c].Store_Google_Maps_address__c ), ISBLANK( [Notification__c].Store_Logo__c ), ISBLANK( [Notification__c].Store_Phone_Number__c ), ISBLANK( [Notification__c].Store_State__c ), ISBLANK( [Notification__c].Store_Street__c ), ISBLANK( [Notification__c].Store_Zip__c ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_7
formulas.expression: AND( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Initial_Email_Send_Status__c}, "Pending"), OR( ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Appointment_Date__c} ), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Appointment_Day_of_Week__c}), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Appointment_Time__c} ), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Appointment_Year__c} ), ISBLANK( TRIM( {!myVariable_current.Customer_Email__c} ) ), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Email_Template_Date_Label__c} ), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Email_Template_Number_Label__c} ), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Store_City__c} ), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Store_Google_Maps_address__c} ), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Store_Logo__c} ), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Store_Phone_Number__c} ), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Store_State__c} ), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Store_Street__c} ), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Store_Zip__c} ) ) )

recordUpdates.name: myRule_1_A1
recordUpdates.label: Update Record showing email can't be sent

value.stringValue: Customer is is not opted in for emails
